public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

A class to build the player for each game.

Version:
0.0.1a
Author:
JCBoysha & e-waste

Method Detail

addToInventory

public void addToInventory(int id,
                           int reference)
Adds an item to the inventory of id at position reference.

Parameters:
id - The ID int of the item in items.csv should always correspond to an item in the items.csv file
reference - The point in the array where the item should be stored. Should always be between 0 and 4.

addToSpellbook

public void addToSpellbook(int id,
                           int reference)
Adds an spell to the spellbook of id at position reference.

Parameters:
id - The ID int of the spell in spells.csv should always correspond to a spell in the spells.csv file
reference - The point in the array where the item should be stored. Should always be between 0 and 4.

public void debugPlayer()
Prints out all the variables and values of the instance of player.

public void setArmor(int mod)
Modifies the armor of the player by amount of variable mod.

Parameters:
mod - The modifying integer. Can be positive or negative

public void setExperience(int mod)
Modifies the experience of the player by int mod.

Parameters:
mod - The modifying integer. Should, almost, always be positive
